Prerequisites: ACG 3111 WITH GRADE OF C OR BETTER.
Course Description: PRINCIPLES OF FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING AND REPORTING FOR GOVERNMENTAL AND NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS. OFFERED CONCURRENTLY WITH ACG 5658; ACG 5658 INCLUDES ADDITIONAL LEARNING OBJECTIVES NOT INCLUDED IN ACG 4501. CREDIT FOR BOTH ACG 4501 AND ACG 5658 IS NOT PERMITTED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
